price: Wͻn antumi ansͻre anyina (wͻn nan so), na wͻn antumi ammoa wͻn ho nso.
arabic: فَمَا ٱسۡتَطَٰعُواْ مِن قِيَامٖ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُنتَصِرِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: famā is'taṭāʿū min qiyāmin wamā kānū muntaṣirīna
